nodes.goal: Isolate variable x on one side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 2*x from both sides to get 2*x on the left side

nodes.goal: Get all x terms on one side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 6 from both sides to get a constant on the right side

nodes.goal: Solve for x by isolating it on one side of the equation
nodes.plan: Divide both sides by 2 to solve for x
